Package SCRAME.Controller

Class StudentCourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SCRAME.Controller.StudentCourseManager

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • initiate

        public static StudentCourseManager initiate()
        Returns StudentCourseManager instance.
        Returns:
        If StudentCourseManager has been instantiated, returns the same instance of StudentCourseManager. Else, creates a new StudentCourseManager and returns it. Saves this instance to theinstance so that the same instance will be return each time initiate() is called.

      • registerCourse

        public void registerCourse​(java.lang.String profile)
        Register for a course.
        Parameters:
        profile - This StudentCourse's student ID. If null is passed into profile, the user will be asked to input a valid student ID.

      • printStudentList

        public void printStudentList()
        Prints out the list of students registered for a course. Asks user to input course code. User can choose to print all the students in the course or students in a particular tutorial or lab group.

      • inputExamMark

        public void inputExamMark()
        Allows user to input a student's exam mark of a course. Asks user to input student ID and course code, then lets user input the exam mark. Updates the dat file after successful course registration.

      • inputCourseworkMark

        public void inputCourseworkMark()
        Allows user to input a student's coursework marks of a course. Asks user to input student ID and course code, then lets user input the coursework marks for each sub-component.

      • printCourseStatistics

        public void printCourseStatistics()
        Displays the percentage of student getting each grade. Asks user to input course code. Prints error message if exam or coursework marks are not entered yet and returns.

      • printStudentTranscript

        public void printStudentTranscript​(java.lang.String profile)
        Displays student transcript containing student name, CPGA, grades and component marks for each course registered. Prints results not available message if marks have not yet been entered.
        Parameters:
        profile - The student's ID.

      • calCGPA

        public double calCGPA​(java.lang.String student)
        Calculates the CGPA of a student
        Parameters:
        student - This student's ID.
        Returns:
        This student's CGPA. -1 to indicate invalid student ID.

      • updateStudentTM

        public void updateStudentTM​(java.lang.String student)
        Updates the byStudent TreeMap.
        Parameters:
        student - The student ID.

      • updateCourseTM

        public void updateCourseTM​(java.lang.String course)
        Updates the byCourse TreeMap.
        Parameters:
        course - The course code.
